section.title: router.stats
section.para: activity command interacts with org.mobincets.slee:name=EventRouterStatistics Bean. It is a non standard SLEE MBean. router.stats allows you to access statistics information of router and container executors. Note that time statistics are measured in milliseconds. It supports following operations:

section.title: mapped-activities
section.para: mapped-activities operation checks how many activities are mapped to certain executor. It requires integer number as argument, representing executor index(starting from 0).

section.title: avg-time
section.para: avg-time operation return average time spent on routing certain event types. It does not support argument. It requires --eventTypeId option to be present. It support following options:

listitem.para: specifies event type for which average time should be fetched. It is mandatory. It requires valid EventTypeID as argument.

example.title: Get average time in all executors

listitem.para: optional option. Indicates executor index for which statistic should be fetched.

section.title: events-routed
section.para: events-routed operation allows to retrieve information about number of routed events. It does not support argument. It requires --eventTypeId option to be present. It supports the following options:

listitem.para: specifies event type for which number should be fetched. It is mandatory. It requires valid EventTypeID as argument.

example.title: Get number of routed events in all executors

listitem.para: optional option. Indicates executor index for which statistic should be fetched.

section.title: executed-tasks
section.para: executed-tasks operation returns number of executed tasks. If no argument is specified it will return total count. If executor index is specified it will return task count for particular executor.

section.title: idle-time
section.para: idle-time operation return time in which executor was idle. Requires executor index as argument(starting from 0).

section.title: misc-tasks
section.para: misc-tasks operation returns number of non routing tasks performed by container. If optional argument is present(executor index), operation returns number for particular executor.

section.title: routing-time
section.para: routing-time operation returns time spent on routing of events. If optional argument is specified(executor index), operation returns time spent on routing by particular executor. It supports the following options:

listitem.para: specifies event type for which number should be fetched. It is mandatory. It requires valid EventTypeID as argument.

example.title: Get number of routed events in all executors

listitem.para: optional option. Indicates executor index for which statistic should be fetched.

section.title: executing-time
section.para: executing-time operation returns time spent on executing tasks. If optional argument is specified(executor index), operation returns time spent on routing by particular executor.

section.title: misc-executing-time
section.para: misc-executing-time operation returns time spent on executing non routing tasks. If optional argument is specified(executor index), operation returns time spent on routing by particular executor.

section.title: print-all
section.para: print-all operation prints all statistics. Does not support argument nor options.
